participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.background: I only speak one language, but I love watching action movies with my family on Netflix. I enjoy having the freedom to wear whatever I want to work, as long as it's not too revealing. I am a middle-aged mother of two high school boys. My most valued possession is my sports jersey. I keep up with my family by making time for them each week, whether it's a phone call, a visit, or sending a care package.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: I prefer to read books to get my entertainment, so social media isn't very important to me. I have always been close to my parents. I’m a Game of Thrones fan who worries about my mom’s health. I like country music. I used to go clubbing every weekend, but now I prefer to stay home with my family and pug.

content.text: Hi there! How was your day?
It was good! I am looking forward to the weekend.
Yeah! Me too. I am going to visit my mom.
That's nice! I love spending time with my mom too.
Yeah, I try to make time for her every week.
That's great! She must be really happy to have you.
Yeah, she is. I am her only child, so I am her whole world.
Aww! That's so sweet. I am an only child too.
Oh! Really? I never would have guessed that.
Yeah, I am pretty close to my parents. They are my best friends.
That's great! I am glad to hear that.
Yeah, I am lucky. They have always been there for me.
Well, I should get going. It was nice chatting with you.
Yeah, you too! Have a great weekend!
